content.question: Which of the following is an example of semantic memory?

choices.label: Recalling a daughterâ€™s wedding day vividly
Recalling the equation to determine the volume of a cylinder
Remembering how to swing a golf club

content.answer: Recalling the equation to determine the volume of a cylinder

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
